mapper.select: /* 입점업체 목록 조회 */ SELECT ec.ent_ceo_no as ceoCode, ec.ent_nm as entName, ec.ent_ceo_phone as ceoTelNo, ec.ent_brno as entBrNo, ct.contract_status as entContractStatus, ct.contract_expiry_date as contractEndDate FROM ent_ceo ec LEFT JOIN ent_contract ct ON ec.ent_ceo_no = ct.ent_ceo_no;
